testcase.classname: To validate the login functionality of the Zappos page
testcase.name: Validate login functionality with valid email and invalid PASSWORD
testcase.system-out: Given User should launch chrome and load the url............................passed When User should click the sign in button...................................passed And User should click the sign in with zappos button........................passed And User should pass the valid email and invalid PASSWORD...................passed And User should click the login button......................................passed And User should print the TITLE of ur page..................................passed Then User should navigate to incorrect credential page......................passed
